00048  *
00049  */
00050 
00051 #pragma once
00052 
00053 #include "params.h"
00054 #include "subscriber.h"
00055 
00056 
00057 #ifndef NO_RODOS_NAMESPACE
00058 namespace RODOS {
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 /**
00062  * @class Putter
00063  * @brief Virtual superclass for classes which implement a put function
00064  *
00065  * Virtual superclass for classes which implement a put function
00066  * to store data, in order to have a generic interface to data storage,
00067  * eg. Fifo, CommBuffer, SyncFifo.
00068  */
00069 class Putter {
00070 public:
00071 
00072     virtual ~Putter() {};
00073 
00074     virtual bool putGeneric(const long topicId, const unsigned int len, const void* msg, const NetMsgInfo& netMsgInfo) {
00075        ERROR("If you see this message, You are overriding a deprecated old put function from Putter. please override only the new (this!) putGeneric");
00076        return false;
00077     }
00078 
00079 };
00080 
00081 
00082 #ifndef NO_RODOS_NAMESPACE
00083 }
00084 #endif
